thread.title: Lisa Hilliard from HilliArts, Freeport NY
thread.title_full: TheMirrorCompany.Com reviewed by Lisa Hilliard from HilliArts, Freeport NY

author: Lisa Hilliard from HilliArts, Freeport NY
title: Lisa Hilliard from HilliArts, Freeport NY
text:
The customer service was excellent from those who handled my account to the two team members who delivered and installed the mirrors. I took cards from the installers specifically to share with my fellow dance studio owners. I will use this company again. Very knowledgeable and courteous people!!!
I am a new studio owner- needless to say I have limited funds. I thought about holding of on the mirrors - I am glad I did not!! This was worth the sacrifice!! My mirrors look wonderful and we are very excited to have them!!!
THANK YOU MIRROR COMPANY!!
